svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

parent="1" source="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-211" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.75;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.75;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" target="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-202" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="400" y="410" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="420" y="410" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-215" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=#FF0000;" value="Terminating Link (ここではHttpLink) でHeaderを設定する" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="250" x="330" y="290" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-216" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="450" width="500" x="85" y="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-217" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<div style="line-height: 160%;">import { ApolloLink, HttpLink, InMomeryCache } from "@apollo/client";<div><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">const link1 = new ApolloLink( ( operation, forward ) =&gt; {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">	<span style="caret-color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">//なんらかの処理</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	return forward( operation );</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">} );</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">const lastLink = new HttpLink( {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	uri: "https://mygraphql-server",</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">headers: {</b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	header1: "value1",</span><br></b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><span style="font-size: 12.000001px; white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>header1: "2",</span><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></span></span></b></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</b></span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">} );</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">const client = new ApolloClient( {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	link: ApolloLink.from( [</span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	link1.</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	lastLink</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>] ),</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	cache: new InMomeryCache()</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">} );</div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="430" width="450" x="110" y="490" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-218" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="クライアント側のLink作成コード" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="215" x="85" y="450" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-219" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#0066CC;dashed=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="150" x="125" y="665" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-220" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=#0066CC;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;rounded=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;spacing=10;fontColor=#0066CC;fontStyle=1" value="headers: {<div><div style=""><span style="white-space: pre; font-size: 12px;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; font-size: 12px;">&lt;項目名&gt;: &lt;値&gt;</span></div><div>}</div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="130" x="360" y="655" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-221" parent="1" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;" value="<font color="#0066cc"><span style="caret-color: rgb(0, 102, 204);"><b>をHttpLinkのコンストラクタ引数のオブジェクトに追加する&nbsp;</b></span></font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="201" x="360" y="755" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-222" parent="1" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;" value="<font color="#0066cc"><span style="caret-color: rgb(0, 102, 204);"><b>*値はstring型で</b></span></font><div><font color="#0066cc"><span style="caret-color: rgb(0, 102, 204);"><b>なければならない</b></span></font></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="101" x="374.5" y="715" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-223" edge="1" parent="1" source="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-220" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#0066CC;" target="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-219" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="740" y="950" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="660" y="950" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 350px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 100px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 241px; height: 1px; padding-top: 85px; margin-left: 26px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
